channel.title: Delta Green: Divergence: Gauntlet Blog
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I present the player-facing casefile documents for the first two mysteries of a new quarterly series. Set in 2018, this campaign uses GUMSHOE's The Fall of Delta Green with some modifications. You can find that here https://gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/delta-green-divergence-casefiles-part-1
